title: Holiday
creator_credit: British Transport Films, Ian Ferguson and John Taylor
brief_description: A fascinating verite document of post-war working class holidayers in Blackpool, Lancashire. A mildly ironic, detatched view of their activities - beach and poolside, amusement rides, a beauty contest, movies, accompanied by the Chris Barber Jazz Band with Ottilie Patterson.
